name: Glimmer Metal
description: Precious metal materials used to upgrade weapons are obtained by disintegrating various accessories.

name: Glistening Coat
description: A glittering bottle of potion that enchants people.

name: Glitter Shell
description: A colorful and distinctive skin that can be purchased from a merchant.

name: Glittering Jacket
description: The legendary clothes worn by merchants with business ethics. It can prove the wearer's excellent taste.

name: Glittering Jacket [1]
description: The legendary clothes worn by cunning merchants, with flickering sequins.

name: Glories Harvest
description: It is full of Sunshine and hard work in this gloden mouth of May. Don't worry, all the hard work will be paid, all the exhausting will turn into smiling. "You get what you give!"
effect: Damage to Plant monsters ＋3%,Damage taken from Insect monsters －3%

description: It is full of Sunshine and hard work in this gloden mouth of May. Don't worry, all the hard work will be paid, all the exhausting will turn into smiling. "You get what you give!"

name: Glove
description: Protect your hands for better attacks!

name: Glow Metal
description: Precious metal materials used to upgrade weapons are obtained by disintegrating various rare equipment.

name: Glutton's Resentment
description: It is the sparks of love and worship in eyes that go through the gate of the nation of cate. [Author: Jacqueline the Sheila]

name: Goat Helm
description: "The Sweat of Sun" and "The symbol of devil" are integrated, the burning soul shines brightly. In Midgard, only the most outstanding adventurers or the most wealthy family members can own this symbol of nobility.
